jobDescription: Principal Applications Engineer, OpticsMarketing | Santa Clara, CA, United States We are looking for a talented Staff Optical Applications Engineer, Optics who will be responsible for product and customer support for Inphi’s next generation optical platforms. The position requires strong customer facing communications skills and technical lab experience. The successful candidate will report to the Sr. Director of Marketing.  In this role you will be responsible to provide technical solutions to customers regarding products/applications and provides hands on support, including pre-sales and post-sales. Be capable of testing optical transceivers on customer system boards to troubleshoot technical issues.Understanding of standards, multi-source agreements and specifications (electrical and optical).Strong interpersonal skill to communicate with customers and various internal groups such as marketing, engineering, sales, and operationsStrong communication, presentation, and documentation skills
